reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Support to UNEP Seminar on Environmental Law and Diplomacy

description.narrative: The Ministry has funded previously the Environmental Law and Diplomacy -course that has been organized by the University of Eastern Finland in collaboration with UNEP. The Ministry has been satisfied with the course but due to the change of the legal statu s of Finnish universities the organizer will now be selected by using open tendering process. In addition to teaching environmental law the course aims to foster contacts between developing and industrialised countries and thus support international enviro nmental negotiations. The course will particularly focus on the synergies between the biodiversity conventions. The course is aimed at experienced officials who take part in international environmental negotiations.
